L

logging - package logging
 
LoggingGUI - Class in logging
The class deals with the entire graphical user interface related to the first page that appears in the process of logging
LoggingGUI() - Constructor for class logging.LoggingGUI
A constructor for the gui of logging
login(JTextField, JPasswordField) - Static method in class logging.LoginLogout
Checks the given username and password combination against the database.
loginCheck(JPasswordField, JTextField) - Static method in class playerManipulation.VerifyPlayer
Checks whether the entered username and password match the information in the database and returns a boolean indicating whether it does or not
LoginLogout - Class in logging
The class deals with logging in and logging out graphical user interface and pulling a username from the player class for easier access to data, when commands need to be performed
LoginLogout() - Constructor for class logging.LoginLogout
 
loginOperator(JPasswordField, JTextField) - Static method in class frontendDatabase.PlayerFrontend
Handles the login operation for a given username and password.
loginPage() - Method in class logging.LoggingGUI
The method to display the logging page
logout() - Static method in class logging.LoginLogout
The method logs a user out clearing all his info from the program
